name: Automaton Lung
description:
Automaton Lung is an experimental third-person exploration game.

Make use of your special abilities to skate, shoot, and fly through over 40 unique locations. In a strange land with almost no information you must be resourceful and clever.
Question everything you see and trust nothing you hear.

Each footstep taken, every mile flown, and all doorways entered reveal more to discover in Automaton Lung.
